summary: 调用DescribeEnsRegions查询您可以使用的ENS节点列表。

schema.description:
节点（地域）ID。

默认查询所有可用节点ID。

Code.description: 业务码。调用成功返回0，失败返回错误码。

400.errorMessage: The input parameters that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied.
The specified field %s invalid. Please check it again.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": 0, "EnsRegions": { "EnsRegions": [ { "Area": "NorthEastChina", "EnName": "NorthChina", "EnsRegionId": "cn-dalian-unicom", "Name": "大连联通", "Province": "辽宁省" } ] }, "RequestId": "473469C7-AA6F-4DC5-B3DB-A3DC0DE3C83E" }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" 0 NorthEastChina NorthChina cn-dalian-unicom 大连联通 辽宁省 473469C7-AA6F-4DC5-B3DB-A3DC0DE3C83E ","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询ENS节点列表
